Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-28180 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.6.1-20
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-28180 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.6.1-20. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package influxdb is earlier than 2.6.1-20, affected by CVE-2024-28180
